privacyInfo.title: Privacy & Data Usage
privacyInfo.deviceData: Some basic information from your device — such as your IP address, browser, system language, and operating system — may be collected automatically when using the app. This data is used solely to generate a personal, anonymous identifier that ensures your clipboard content is never mixed with other users'.
privacyInfo.clipboardStorage: All content you paste in the app is stored anonymously, tied only to this identifier. This data can be deleted at any time by you, and is also automatically removed after a certain period.
privacyInfo.analyticsUse: The identifier may also help us improve the app through internal analytics. None of this information, including pasted data, will ever be shared with third parties or used for commercial purposes, under any circumstances.
privacyInfo.deletionOption: You can delete your identifier and all associated content whenever you wish (already available within the clipboard view).
privacyInfo.contact: If you have any questions or suggestions about privacy, feel free to reach out.
